fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EU policy on European standardization as defined in EU Regulation 1025/2012 and other EU policies/legislative initiatives involving European standardization
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: CEN is a major provider of European Standards and technical specifications. It is the only recognized European organization according to Regulation 1025/2012 for the planning, drafting and adoption of European Standards in all areas of economic activity with the exeption of electrotechnology (CENELEC) and telecommunication (ETSI).
